actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill entitled, the "Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1985".
short_title: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1984

summary.text: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1984 - Grants an antitrust exemption to health care insurers for the purposes of: (1) acquiring data on health care costs and services; (2) collecting and distributing insurance claims for health care services; and (3) entering into service and cost agreements with health care providers. Authorizes the Attorney General to investigate such joint activities to determine whether they conform to this Act.

titles.title: Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1984
A bill entitled, the "Health Care Cost Containment Act of 1985".
